document_data.caption: A map showing Shrimp Alley in the Dock Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Shrimp Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Shrimp Alley''', which was also called '''Shrimp Street''', was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Shrimp Alley was located in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]]. The alley off of the western side of [[Snail Street]] at the intersection with [[Presper Street]]. Shrimp Alley passed south for a bit before turning southwest near its intersection with [[Pressbow Lane]] to terminate on [[Ship Street (Waterdeep)|Ship Street]]. Shrimp Alley was intersected on its north side near the midway point by the [[Street of Six Casks]].
